dcterms:description: The IRD dataset contains videos from CCTV cameras used for monitoring illegal dumping. It includes video clips averaging 690 frames in length, divided into two classes: garbage dumping action and normal events. The dataset is suitable for evaluating methods for recognizing object-related human actions in unconstrained environments.
dcterms:title: IRD dataset

dcterms:creator: C.-B. Jin
T. D. Do
M. Liu
H. Kim
dcterms:description: The ICVL-4 dataset includes dynamic sub-actions of multiple people in surveillance scenes, divided into 13 categories. It contains 497 original videos, with specific classes related to object-related actions such as phoning, smoking, texting, and dumping.
dcterms:title: ICVL-4 dataset
